#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>

static unsigned long long int arr[]={0,1,4,27,256,3125,46656,823543,16777216,387420489ULL,10000000000ULL};

using namespace std;

int main(){
unsigned long long int t,N,A,B,K,i,j;
	
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>A>>B;
		
		N = arr[A]-((A-1)*B);
		j=N;
		cout<<N;
		for(i=1;i<=A;i++){
			j-=B;
			j-=(j/A);
			}
			K=j;
		cout<<" "<<K<<endl;
		
		}
		
	}
